result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ga: ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.orig: ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.html: ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ponchtml: ba ċeart aṁarc go géar ar an ċonraḋ arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.

result.eng: He looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ga: d'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.orig: d'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.html: d'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach airHe looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ponchtml: d'aṁarc sé orm agus dreaċ brónaċ airHe looked at me with a sad expression.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ an mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ga: bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.orig: bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.html: bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ponchtml: ḃí cuma ní ba ḋoiṁne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.html: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ponchtml: ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: He looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ga: d'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.orig: d'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.html: d'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ponchtml: d'aṁarc sé ar an taċrán ar ġreim láiṁe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.

result.eng: He looked around with scare and panic.
result.ga: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.orig: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.html: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.
result.ponchtml: d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar scáfar ina ṫimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.
